RESULT_FAILED - Static variable in class haibison.android.lockpattern.LockPatternActivity
If you use LockPatternActivity.ACTION_COMPARE_PATTERN and the user fails to "login" after a number of tries, this activity will finish with this result code.
RESULT_FORGOT_PATTERN - Static variable in class haibison.android.lockpattern.LockPatternActivity
If you use LockPatternActivity.ACTION_COMPARE_PATTERN and the user forgot his/ her pattern and decided to ask for your help with recovering the pattern (LockPatternActivity.EXTRA_PENDING_INTENT_FORGOT_PATTERN), this activity will finish with this result code.
